This price not only reflects the worth of the product but also allows us to cover our costs and maintain our business operations. I understand its value to you is $80, but I hope you'll consider the additional benefits and quality that justifies this offer. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
